name: Environment Escape
description:
This is a Virtual Reality Escape Room experience

Within this you, the player, will be put into an environment of which you have to figure your way out of. There are challenges and puzzles along the way which must be completed in order for you to progress. Embrace this world you're being put into and see if you are able to escape, challenge your friends to see if they can do as well as you.

HOW TO INSTALL

1. Download the ZIP file.  2. Extract all the files from the ZIP file. 3. Launch Environment Escape

DISCLAIMER!!! This is a university Final Year Project, so any Feedback would be much appreciated!
